sentence.text: In this study, we enrolled 16 individuals affected by tooth agenesis, prevalently hypodontia, and we carried out direct Sanger sequencing of paired box 9 (negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated) and negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II homeobox 1 (cell morphogenesis) genes in 9 subjects.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Overall, our study confirmed the major role played by canonical Wnt signaling pathway in tooth agenesis and the genetic heterogeneity of this disease.
